import React from 'react'; import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css'; import { Button } from 'react-bootstrap'; import formik from './formik'; const App=()=> { const formik=useFormik({ initialValues:{ FirstName:'', SecondName:'', PhoneNumber:'', Password:'', ConfirmPassword:'' }, onsubmit:(values) => { console.log(values); } }) return (
); } export default App;
